data.title: ER/Heart of the Matter
data.text:
This article about an episode needs to be expanded with more information.

Please help out by editing it.

Heart of the Matter is the sixth episode of the thirteenth season of ER, and the two hundred seventy-third episode overall.

Starring: Goran Visnjic (Dr. Luka Kovac), Maura Tierney (Dr. Abby Lockhart), Mekhi Phifer (Dr. Gregory Pratt), Parminder Nagra (Dr. Neela Rasgotra), John Stamos (Dr. Tony Gates), Linda Cardellini (Nurse Samantha Taggart), Shane West (Dr. Ray Barnett), Scott Grimes (Dr. Archie Morris)

and Laura Innes (Dr. Kerry Weaver)

Special Guest Stars: Forest Whitaker (Curtis Ames), Paula Malcomson (Meg Riley), Leland Orser (Dr. Lucien Dubenko), Busy Philipps (Hope Bobeck)

Guest Starring: Michelle Hurd (Courtney Brown), Sam Jones III (Chaz Pratt), J.P. Manoux (Dr. Dustin Crenshaw), Gina Ravera (Dr. Bettina DeJesus), Charlayne Woodard (Angela Gilliam), Laura Cer√≥n (Chuny Marquez), Malaya Rivera Drew (Katey Alvaro), Troy Evans (Frank Martin), Yvette Freeman (Haleh Adams), Chloe Greenfield (Sarah Riley), Marty Ingels (Mr. Gallagher), Allison Scagliotti (Josie Weller), Lyn Alicia Henderson (Pamela Olbes), Gilbert Glenn Brown (Lou Smith), Sonya Eddy (Harriet), Lindsay Marie Felton (Donna Palsey), James Gleason (Garrett Palsey), Shannon Holt (Helen Palsey), Judith Scott (Mandy Smith), Sal Viscuso (Mr. Weller), Gregory Wagrowski (Walton)

Co-Starring: Derick Alexander (Hospital Officer), Mark Ankeny (Electrician), Lennox Brown (Bailiff), Matthew Elkins (George), Amy D. Higgins (Victoria), Yee Yee Lee (Foreperson), Dinah Lenney (Shirley), Brian Lester (Dumar), Michael J. London (Judge Lahn), Angel Laketa Moore (Dawn), Alexis Rhee (Mrs. Paik), Javier Ronceros (Maintinence Guy), Eve Sigall (Genie Weller), Kim Strauss (Ari), Philip Weiner (Teacher's Asst.), Dana Michael Woods (Chante)

Plot Overview

Kovac awaits the jury decision in the Curtis Ames case; Ray gets jealous after he sees Neela & Gates flirting with each other; Luka and Ray treat a motorcycle driver injured in an accident, but when his condition takes a turn for the worse, his wife ends up getting affected by it.
